name: Jam Evasion
description:
Jam Evasion

Place cards to give the frog instructions on how to move. Be strategic with your cards to prevent the frog from being run over. Win by getting rid of all the cards in your hand!

Credits:

"Jew's Harp, Single, A (H1).wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
